name: Pizza Room (Healfish-Games)
description:
WARNING: Game contains themes of unreality and elements of trypophobia. Player discretion is advised.

Hello inmate, and welcome to the Pizza Room initiative, hosted by SBPC Corp.

Are you ready to get rehabilitated?

Pizza Room is a game made for the Horror Game Jam - Isolation. You play as a prisoner who has to go through a week of pizza-making labor in order to buy your way out of incarceration. But not all as it seems...
